Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
^2CAP YOUR ELEMENTAL RESISTANCES +12355 to all elemental resistance
^6=== 3.19 Spirit Offering === Minions have 180% increased critical strike chance Minions have +39% critical strike multiplier
^2=== Animate Guardian === Nearby allies have culling strike Nearby allies have +10 fortification You have fortify Nearby allies have +50% to critical strike multiplier
^4=== Brittle Boots === Minions have +2% to critical strike chance
^1=== Spectres (not 100% uptime) === Remove " # " to display the DPS gain from them Demon Harpy: #Nearby enemies take 50% increased physical damage Pale Seraphim: #Nearby enemies take 15% increased damage Arena Master: #Minions deal 20% increased damage #Minions have 20% increased attack speed
